content: I submitted pest 1 and my score on the scores page shows up as -0.1% for some reason - is this an error or does it mean  something is wrong with the code?
subject: -0.1% score

content: student raised this during office hours just now. is piazza the right place for this issue?
<md>I believe this is usually an error that happens until the grades have been released or entered?</md>
The pset grade will appear 3 days after the pset due date (to give people a chance to use late days). The -0.1 score is just because there is nothing to calculate right now.
